com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.ruleset

Class Condition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.ruleset.Condition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Condition>

    public class Condition
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Condition>
    Condition class can either represent a classification or a metrics formula (Rule condition).
    Since:
    3.3
    Version:
    23/08/2013
    Author:
    Khaled Bakhit
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
